High Impedance (High "Z") unit with standard ramp and Aux I options.
Three High "Z" tap settings:

Output: Positive or Negative (currently set)
Tap 1: 0V to 775V, Max 16.00A (currently set)
Tap 2: 0V to 1000V, Max 12.80A
Tap 3: 0V to 1250V, Max 10.00A
